column1: Table 5.11: Details of reservation improvement for Wilpassa wewa in MWS-020-2

column2:
1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Madan /Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna /Mango/Guava randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 500 m2. & Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
2. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 400 m2. & Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.
3. Excavate about 150m x 12m x 4m prism towards upstream to enhance the tank capacity (3600cum @631)
4. Transport of an excavator J10A
